skill.name: Combat Medic
skill.normal: After you have revived a crew member, you receive a 25% damage bonus for 10 seconds.
skill.ace: Reviving a crew member gives them 30% more health.

skill.name: Quick Fix
skill.normal: Decreases your first aid kit and doctor bag deploy time by 50%.
skill.ace: Crew members that use your first aid kits or doctors bags take 15% less damage for 120 seconds.

skill.name: Painkillers
skill.normal: Crew members you revive take 30% less damage for 5 seconds
skill.ace: The damage reduction is increased by an additional 50%.

skill.name: Uppers
skill.normal: Adds 7 more first aid kits to your inventory.
skill.ace: Adds 3 more first aid kills yo you inventory. Your deployed first aid kits will be automatically used if a player would go down within a 5 meter radius of the first aid kit.

skill.name: Combat Doctor
skill.normal: You can now place 2 doctor bags
skill.ace: Your doctor bags have 2 more charges.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.normal: You revive crew members 50% faster. Shouting at your teammates will increase their movement speed by 20% for 30 seconds.
skill.ace: There is a 75% chance that you can revive crew members at a distance by shouting at them.

skill.name: Endurance
skill.normal: Increases your supply of cable ties by 4. You can cable tie hostages 75% faster.
skill.ace: Increases stamina by 150% and your crews stamina by 50%.

skill.name: Cable Guy
skill.normal: The power and range of your intimidation is increased by 50%.
skill.ace: You can now have 2 converted enemies at the same time.

skill.name: Joker
skill.normal: You can convert a non-special enemy to fight on your side.
skill.ace: Your converted enemy gains 55% more hp and 45% more damage. Time to convert and enemy is reduced by 65%.

skill.name: Stockholm Syndrome
skill.normal: Civilians are intimidated by the noise you make and remain intimidated 50% longer.
skill.ace: Whenever you go into custody, your hostages will trade themselves in for you. This effect can occur during assaults, but only 1 time.

skill.name: Partner in Crime
skill.normal: Having a converted enemy increases you movement speed by 10%. Your converted enemy takes an additional 45% less damage.
skill.ace: Having a converted enemy increases you health by 30%. Your converted enemy takes an additional 45% less damage.

skill.name: Hostage Taker
skill.normal: Having at least one hostage or converted enemy makes you regenerate 1.5% health every 5 seconds.
skill.ace: Having at least one hostage or converted enemy makes you regenerate 4.5% health every 5 seconds.

skill.name: Stable Shot
skill.ace: You gain 16 weapon accuracy while standing still.

skill.name: Rifleman
skill.normal: Your snap to zoom is 100% faster with all weapons. Your movement speed is unhindered while using steel sight.
skill.ace: Weapon zoom is increased by 25% on all weapons. Your weapon accuracy while moving with Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles is increased by 50%.

skill.name: Marksman
skill.normal: You gain 8 weapon accuracy with all SMGs, Assault rifles and Snipers fired in single shot.
skill.ace: You gain a 20% accuracy bonus while ADS with SMGs, Assault rifles and Snipers fired in single shot.

skill.name: Spotter
skill.ace: Enemies you mark take an additional 50% damage when further than 25 meters.

skill.name: Aggressive Reload
skill.normal: Increases your reload speed with assault rifles by 15%.
skill.ace: Any killing headshot will reduce your reload time by 40% for 2 seconds. Can only be triggered by SMG, Assault Rifle and Sniper Rifle fired in single shot.

skill.name: Ammo Efficiency
skill.normal: Getting 3 headshots in less than 6 seconds will refund 1 bullet to your used weapon. Only triggered by SMGs, assault rifles and snipers fired in single shot.
skill.ace: Getting 2 headshots in a row will refund 1 bullet to your used weapon. Only triggered by SMGs, assault rifles and snipers fired in single shot.
